dcterms:description: A large dataset with ground truth human and object motions, dense RGB inputs, and rich object-mounted IMU measurements, covering 295 interaction sequences with 10 diverse objects and a total of 892k frames of recording.

dcterms:description: A dataset for joint markerless 3D tracking of humans and objects in interaction, providing a benchmark for evaluating tracking methods.
